name: Necrowmancer
description: Take on the role of Croseph the Necromancer in this puzzle-platformer, and use your minions to destroy your enemies! Once part of an evil alliance that conquered the kingdom, Croseph was betrayed and cast aside by his companions. Now, with the help of his undead minions, Croseph embarks on a quest to take his revenge on the traitors and seize the kingdom for himself.
